org.barghos.core

Class BufferUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.barghos.core.BufferUtils

  • public class BufferUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for creating different buffers more easiely.

        public static java.nio.FloatBuffer wrapTuple2FBuffer(ITup2fR... v)
        Creates a Float-Buffer from the given tuples. They are safed tuplewise componentwise (t1.x, t1.y, t2.x, t2.y, ...).
        Parameters:
        v - The elements that should be saved in the buffer.
        Returns:
        The new Float-Buffer.
